titles: A brief justification of the Prince of Orange's descent into England, and of the kingdoms late recourse to arms with a modest disquisition of what may become the wisdom and justice of the ensuing convention in their disposal of the crown.
author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
publisher: Printed for J.S. and sold by Richard Baldwin ...,
notes: Attributed to Robert Ferguson. Cf. BM.
Reel 67:14 listed erroneously on film as Wing F732, which should have spelling "sould" in imprint.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library and Duke University Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  William and Mary, 1689-1702.
